whats-is.title: What is an incubation?
whats-is.description: NOSSAS offers training, technology, legal counsel and support to incubate or accelerate mobilization-based projects using our methodologies.

we-offer.title: We offer:
we-offer.1: Training in communication tools and strategies
we-offer.2: Transfer of mobilization methodologies and technologies
we-offer.4: Solutions for organizing people, team training and volunteer management

projects.title:
Previous
incubations
projects.description: See some of the projects that have already gone through  NOSSAS's incubation process and are now works of reference in their areas of expertise.

1.title: Acolhe LGBT+
1.description: A solidarity network for the LGBTQIA+ community to connect people needing psychological support to a network of volunteers.

2.title: Me Representa
2.description: A matching platform for candidates and electors who advocate for Human Rights.

3.title: Defezap
3.description: Defezap is a pioneering system for denouncing state violence in Rio de Janeiro, via Whatsapp, guaranteeing anonymity for the  victims.

4.title: Rede nossas cidades
4.description: A network of city-based activist communities spread across Brazil, including Meu Rio, Minha Sampa and Meu Recife.

5.title: Beta
5.description: Facebook's first feminist robot monitors the process of bills on women's rights and warns her followers when she senses possible backsliding!

6.title: Rede de Apoio Psicológico
6.description: In 2020, we connected COVID 19 front line health professionals with volunteer psychologists willing to serve them.

1.title: Mapa do acolhimento
1.description: Mapa do Acolhimento connects women who have suffered violence to lawyers and psychologists who have volunteered their services to help them.

incubate.title: Incubate your project
incubate.description: Do you have an amazing project which could have a positive impact on your community but need a bit of help to get it out into the world? Our incubator was made for you! Sign up and we'll be in touch with you very soon!

form.title: Sign up
form.success: We received your application! In up to two weeks we'll get in touch with you to talk about your project :) Good luck!
